result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Isaiah E Kern

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Isaiah E Kern not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court for Isaiah E Kern.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Scheduling conference.  Defense has received all discovery and an offer from the State and requests further Status conference. Case adjourned to Br. 9.
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Isaiah E Kern appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask appeared by video for Isaiah E Kern.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.   Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge VanGrunsven Branch 09.   Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 09.
Scheduling conference scheduled for October 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Isaiah E Kern appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Joseph Thomas Domask in court for Isaiah E Kern.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a hearing. State notified the court that a preliminary hearing needs to be completed. Case adjourned for a preliminary hearing in preliminary court.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Isaiah E Kern not in court, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Abby Rockendorf in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case set for status of counsel. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for cause to the trial court for a State V. Lee Hearing.
Hearing scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Isaiah E Kern not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for State of Wisconsin in court.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Status of Counsel in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.
Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
  No possession of any controlled substance without a valid prescription.

Defendant Isaiah E Kern in court with attorney Joan Elizabeth Zawikowski.  Defendant Isaiah E Kern in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Van Grunsven, Branch 09. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.
  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
